description:
Creates an empty version commit and tag, and fail if the repo is not clean.

The <version> argument should be a valid semver string, or one of following:
build, patch, minor, major.

If supplied with --message (shorthand: -m) config option, bower will use it
as a commit message when creating a version commit. If the message config
contains %s then that will be replaced with the resulting version number.

For example:

    bower version patch -m "Upgrade to %s for reasons"

options.description: Custom git commit and tag message
